content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS and fuel {'coal': 17}.
  
### Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS and fuel {'coal': 6}.

### Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) with status EntityStatus.WORKING and fuel {'coal': 4}.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient materials
- Ensure you have enough materials before attempting to craft or insert items into furnaces.

### Errors when inserting into furnaces
- Verify that you have the required ingredients to insert into the furnace to avoid the NO_INGREDIENTS warning.

### Errors when trying to access entities
- Make sure that the entities you are trying to interact with are present and correctly positioned on the map to avoid errors related to missing entities.
